description: This file defines the NotesDb class which provides SQLite database management functionalities for a notes application, including initialization, CRUD operations, and query methods.

classes.name: NotesDb
classes.description: Handles SQLite database initialization and raw CRUD operations for notes, including creating tables, indexes, and executing insert, update, delete, and query commands.

methods.name: _open
methods.description: Initializes and opens the database, creating tables and indexes if necessary.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new note record into the database and returns the new row ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note record identified by ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note record by ID.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a single note record by ID.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes, optionally filtered by a search term, ordered by pinned status and the specified sort column.
